title: SparkyLinux 3.4.1 Base Edition x86_64
description:
SparkyLinux 3.4.1 Base Edition x86_64 (Openbox)

SparkyLinux is a rolling release built on the 'testing'
branch of Debian GNU/Linux.

- The easiest way for getting Debian testing
- Most wireless and mobile network cards supported
- Set of selected applications, multimedia codecs & plugins
- Easy hard drive-/USB-installation

Other ISOs with the following desktops are available on
the manufacturer's site:

Mate | LXDE | Xfce | Razor-Qt | e18

Cinnamon is installable within minutes via console or
synaptic - to prevent download-time use this 'Openbox'-
ISO (or the 'CLI Edition' for building own customized
desktops) - same procedure for getting Enlightenment
or JWM.

OS Type: Linux
Based on: Debian (Testing)
Origin: Poland
Architecture: i386, x86_64
Language: Multilanguage

A special gaming edition called 'GameOver' exists on
the manufacterer's site.
